text:
Employees of a sand
and gravel company which sells its products to a local tile manufacturer who
uses it in the manufacture of drainage tile for sale to local farmers engaged
in the production of goods for interstate commerce, are not engaged in
processes or occupations closely related and directly essential to the
production of the farm products which may be shipped out of the State.
html: Employees of a sand and gravel company which sells its products to a local tile manufacturer who uses it in the manufacture of drainage tile for sale to local farmers engaged in the production of goods for interstate commerce, are not engaged in processes or occupations closely related and directly essential to the production of the farm products which may be shipped out of the State.
